recipe.title: Nuoc Cham Dipping Sauce
ingredients: 1/4 cup Asian fish sauce, preferably nuoc mam
1 fresh Thai chile (2 to 3 inches; preferably red) including seeds, thinly sliced crosswise
instructions: Stir together sugar and water in a bowl until sugar is dissolved. Stir in remaining ingredients and chill, covered, at least 2 hours to allow flavors to develop. Bring to room temperature before serving (this will take about 1 hour).
